attributes.title: Just what we needed
attributes.review: What a great way to get /stay informed. Brilliant! Can't wait to see this app evolve.

attributes.title: TRUMP 2016
attributes.review: Great App, very user friendly interface, and provides TRUTHFUL news on Mr. Trump, as well as an election countdown timer.

attributes.title: #MAGA for sure!
attributes.review: App is awesome, informative and works great! Get it and keep yourself updated!

attributes.title: 10/10 would MAGA again
attributes.review: Meme magic made the CURRENT YEAR the best year.

attributes.title: Great app
attributes.review: Love the app.  Lots of information on Trump campaign.  Sad to see Hillary supporters joining the app to bash it on the reviews.

attributes.title: #MAGA !!!
attributes.review: Clean and easy way to keep up on & participate in, all things Trump!

attributes.title: Amazing App
attributes.review: Very informative, fun, and easy to follow. Highly recommend!!!

attributes.title: Trump for president!
attributes.review: I really want Trump to be president. He is way better than that criminal Hillary.

attributes.title: Love the app - Great for Trumpites
attributes.review: Great app. Can engage my contacts to help get out the vote for Trump. Works seamlessly with Facebook and Twitter.

attributes.title: Love it!
attributes.review: This new app is a real treat. Leave it to a great marketer to make supporting the Trump-Pence ticket always a lot of fun.
